label: ham
subject: Re: Cross Realm SMB Signature Failure
body: 11 (return) [ Compare Idatius and the Paschal Chronicle, with Ammianus, (l, xiv. c. 5.) The _year_ in which Constantius was created C¾sar seems to be more accurately fixed by the two chronologists; but the historian who lived in his court could not be ignorant of the _day_ of the anniversary. For the appointment of the new C¾sar to the provinces of Gaul, see Julian, Orat. i. p. 12, Godefroy, Chronol. Legum, p. 26. and Blondel, de PrimautŽ de lÕEglise, p. 1183.]
